```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(gender)

```


```{r}
install.packages("genderdata", repos = "https://dev.ropensci.org", type = "source")
```


```{r}
# Read in Data
coaches <- read_csv("data/coaches.csv")

head(coaches)
View(coaches)

coaches <- coaches %>%
  separate(Name, c("lastName", "firstName"), sep = ",", extra = "merge")
 
```


```{r}
# Testing gender library

demo_df <- tibble(names = coaches$firstName,
                      birth_year = 2000,
                      stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
head(demo_df)

gender_df(demo_df, method = "demo",
          name_col = "names", year_col = "birth_year")
```
